Event.Message: Process %1 started at time %2 by parent %3 running in session %4 with name %5.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:PID"/> <data name="CreateTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ParentProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:PID"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Process %1 (which started at time %2) stopped at time %3 with exit code %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:PID"/> <data name="CreateTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ExitTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ExitCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TokenElevationType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HandleCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CommitCharge" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="CommitPeak" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:PID"/> <data name="ThreadID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:TID"/> <data name="StackBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="StackLimit" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="UserStackBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="UserStackLimit" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="StartAddr" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Win32StartAddr" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="TebBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:PID"/> <data name="ThreadID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:TID"/> <data name="StackBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="StackLimit" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="UserStackBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="UserStackLimit" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="StartAddr" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Win32StartAddr" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="TebBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Process %3 had an image loaded with name %7.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ImageBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ImageSize" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:PID"/> <data name="ImageCheckSum" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TimeDateStamp" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DefaultBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Process %3 had an image unloaded with name %7.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ImageBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ImageSize" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:PID"/> <data name="ImageCheckSum" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TimeDateStamp" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DefaultBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
